ygData.subject: Re: Combinations for that fishing pole = 1,287 are possible (?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe they are way ahead of us, who knows, they might have already infiltrated this list, and have already posted a false failed attempt at making the
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe they are way ahead of us, who knows, they might have already
infiltrated this list, and have already posted a false "failed attempt" at
making the fishing pole to throw us off. Any one of us could be the one from
thier guild, maybe it's you, maybe it's me! Who knows?

>From: AOLTechDaZ@...
>
>We can always resort to begging. EVERYONE email EQ and tell them we are
>pissed that the damned Collapsible fishing pole is so damned hard to find
>or
>make. For the time we have put into it it should be the Equivelant of
>the
>Fiery avenger sword or SOUFIRE. And the spyglass isn't too great!
>Lets
>show EQ the database and how much money has been invested maybe they feel
>sorry for us and give us a hint.
>
>Second idea, That gnome that somone claims to have seen selling
>spyglasses.
> Somone infiltrate his guild to get the damned secret. Whoever told us
>about it. You volunteered. Now away brave soldier and don't come back
>unless you have something!
>
>Shmellbee Nukinfutz, povar. Master manipulator of the dead.
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
